job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience

jd: From: Nitin Tehriya, Tek Inspirations LLC nitin.tehriya@tekinspirations.com Reply to: nitin.tehriya@tekinspirations.com Job Title: Frontend Developer6+ months Location: Lansing, MI HYBRIDClient: State of MINeed only local to Lansing, MIPlease submit only those consultants who can take F2F interview!As a frontend developer, responsibilities include but not limited to working with development project teams, UI/UX designers and Business analysts to develop and maintain reusable UI components that are accessible, performant, scalable, and robust. Must be familiar with WCAG 2.1, ADA compliance and responsive design. All development will be tested by the developer for accessibility using Jaws reader along with multiple browser plugins.Requirements:Strong background with React.js (Required, 5 years).Experience with HTML5 and CSS Frameworks (Required, 5 Years).Strong knowledge and background with ADA, WCAG 2.1, Section 508 compliance policies, User Experience design principles and standards (Required, 5 years).Experience with current JAVA, this includes using relevant IDE tools such as Eclipse/Jboss Developer Studio (Required, 3 Years).Experience programming in projects using JPA framework (Required, 2 Years).Experience programming in projects using current Spring framework (Required, 2 Years).Experience programming with Spring Boot and Spring Data (Required, 2 Years).Experience programming with Java 8+ (Required, 3 Years).Experience participating as a programmer within an Agile development environment (Required, 2 Years).Experience programming in the JBOSS Enterprise environment (Desired, 2 Years).Education:Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
